name: OverScape
description:
OverScape is a time trial game, where you pilot a ship with a fun and nervous handling. The game offers the possibility to create your own maps and share them easily.

How to import a map :  

  1. In game, go to settings > content manager.
  2. Click on "Open map folder".
  3. Place the .map file in it.
  4. Return in game and click on "Refresh map list". Done !

Please note that the game is in alpha and is still in development. So you may encounter bugs when using it. Some parts of the game may change and some of the content you create may be incompatible with the new versions.
